channel.title: Hide/show admin/mod/owner
channel.description:
[shadow=blue,left]Right, so I've seen this on another server and loved the idea of it.
the mods and admins had crowns on the mini-map to show them-selves and they had normal crowns next to their name , then they typed ::modoff and they both dissapeared , so as if they was normal players, but they still had their commands?
has anyone got a command with the crowns on mini-map on/off and the crown next to name on/off :) thanks.[/shadow]
